agreement.title: Data Processing Consent (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. a GDPR):
agreement.intro: By clicking "I Agree", you consent to:

items.storage: Local storage of your CV data in encrypted BadgerDB format
items.processing: Processing of your personal data for CV management purposes
items.logging: Logging of data operations for compliance transparency

agreement.disclaimer: You can withdraw your consent at any time in Settings. All your data is stored locally on your device and never transmitted to external servers.

consent.footer: By using this application, you confirm that you have read and understood our data processing practices.

notifications.consentGranted: Consent granted. Your data will be encrypted and stored securely.
notifications.consentWithdrawn: Consent withdrawn. Please restart the application.

confirmations.deleteCV: Are you sure you want to delete this CV? This action cannot be undone.
confirmations.deleteAllData: WARNING: This will permanently delete ALL your data.\n\nType "DELETE ALL MY DATA" to confirm:
confirmations.exportAllData: This will export all your data as JSON. Continue?
confirmations.withdrawConsent:
Warning: Withdrawing consent will disable all data operations.

You will need to consent again to use the application.

Continue?
confirmations.exit: Do you really want to exit CV Manager?

quickCreate.title: Create New CV
quickCreate.subtitle: Fill in the essential information and get started immediately

step1.title: Create Your First CV
step1.description: Let's walk you through creating your professional CV in just a few steps.

step2.title: Personal Information
step2.description: Enter your name, contact details, and professional summary. All data is encrypted and stored locally.

step3.title: Customize & Export
step3.description: Choose from 3 templates and 6 color schemes. Export to PDF when ready!

step4.title: You're All Set!
step4.description: Start creating your CVs. Your data is encrypted with AES-256 and GDPR compliant.
